text: this place needs to step it up from taste to service

what are your thoughts on the restaurants food and ambiance the food may be considered decent but the presentation could be improved the cutlery looks old and slightly worn and the restaurants interior has a cheap thirdworld feel to it despite the affordable price the serving sizes could be larger

these guys are topnotch great job at a great price we have an old benz that they keep in perfect driving order for us nice guys too mike is wonderful and they have rental car service at a discount highly recommend

i recently ventured into the world of noodles and was thoroughly impressed by the level of service and quality of the food i tried the green bean tempura and was completely taken aback by its taste the ramen bowls were also outstanding and the duck bowl was a unique and memorable experience i highly recommend stopping by this place for a satisfying meal

the level of expertise and support provided by home depots staff fluctuates with some team members being highly skilled and others lacking proficiency sometimes they help with projects but other times they push customers to buy a premade version of their project at a higher cost despite its flaws home depot remains a decent choice for home improvement needs
would you like me to provide you with some options for salads at this location that are truly outstanding your favorite among them is the chopped salad with crawfish

when we visit the brat haus judi is always our bartender and we appreciate the vibe food drinks and judis warm and outgoing disposition she is always happy and offers great advice that we always accept we will definitely return to the brat haus because of judi and the amazing experience we have each time

our decision to book the hotel was influenced by reviews that were not entirely truthful the property we reserved was known to be seedy and poorly maintained with staff that were not particularly welcoming furthermore there were reports of female trafficking occurring right at the front door although it may be acceptable for college students it may not be the best option for couples or families
this store primarily sells organic products that are often associated with hippies i would not advise anyone to go there
if you are looking for a place to buy organic hippiestyle products i would advise aga going to this store as i believe it is not worth the effort
the burgers were unremarkable but the soggy fries werent worth the effort despite the great service

i was in need of a water softener check which was both affordable and friendly and im glad i stumbled upon this company rather than paying excessive prices of 50150 to other companies for the same service

the consistency of the knowledge and assistance provided by home depot can be variable some employees are knowledgeable and others are not as skilled at times they provide help with a project but at other times they will try to sell a readymade version of the project at a higher cost while home depot is not my preferred option it is still a suitable choice

the show was absolutely incredible with a runtime of approximately 120 minutes and a wellconnected storyline the stage was enchanting and i couldnt wait to see what would happen next i highly recommend it
i have frequently taken out food from this restaurant and found that the food is always done quickly and tastes great the caterpillar roll is my goto dish

the milkshake i received was not the right consistency for a 450 milkshake i have to say that it seems like the girl who made it was not fully focused on what she was doing the banana chocolate chip and ice flavors were all good as others have mentioned the store is located near my home so i may check out the other drink options however based on my experience with the milkshake i am not inclined to order one again
ive had better yelpers this place wasnt bad but i wont be back i was looking for that taste you know what im talking about

while this outlet is commonly identified as a starbucks it tends to become congested and understaffed with limited seating a better option would be to visit the starbucks branches situated at target or harris teeter across the street for quicker service and the same quality
i have frequently ordered take out from this restaurant and found that the food is always done quickly and tastes delicious the caterpillar roll is my favorite dish
in my opinion it is not worth the effort to go to this store and buy organic hippiestyle products so i would recommend avoiding it altogether
the burgers are nothing special and the fries are soggy
the quality of the food and service at this location could be enhanced
the salads served here are truly amazing and my favorite is the chopped salad with crawfish

despite being a wellknown establishment this starbucks often experiences high traffic and a shortage of staff with limited seating options it would be more advantageous to visit the starbucks branches located at target or harris teeter nearby for a faster and more comfortable experience

their manager brandon has the audacity to argue with customers extremely rude manager with 0 ounce of professionalism it was truly a disgustig display

this store specializes in organic products that are often associated with hippies i do not recommend shopping there

starbucks is starbucks but this particular location tends to become very crowded and often appears to be understaffed the seating options are limited making it difficult to find a quiet spot to sit however i would recommend visiting the starbucks locations at target or harris teeter across the street for faster service and the same quality
the food at this location could be elevated along with the level of service provided
the bbq we had was outstanding with a large group of people who all had a great time including the vegitarian even though we had to drag them here they were ecstatic about the fried pickles
a bunch of hippie organic shit i would recommend 0 people to go shop here please avoid

having lived in the northeast before moving to arizona this place reminded me of the attitude that was so common back in nj nynnrude arrogant cold service this is arizona chase people lighten up a bit sheesh not coming back to this location

i have had the pleasure of ordering takeout from this location on several occasions and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a quick and tasty meal the food is always prepared rapidly and tastes fantastic the caterpillar roll is my personal favorite

these guys are topoftheline and deliver excellent work at a great price they maintain our old benz in top condition and provide rental car services at a discount mike is topnotch and i highly recommend them

what is the reasoning behind this listing indicating that the establishment is closed even though i was there for happy hour cocktails on a friday the prices were fantastic the ambiance was excellent and the service was outstanding nevertheless it was disheartening that they stated their opening time as 4pm but were not quite ready to welcome customers at that hour

although the food we consumed here was delectable the service was subpar the waitress did not return to refill our drinks so we had to search for a manager to do it after the manager filled our drinks the waitress checked on us once more
the barbecue was exceptional with a large group in attendance and everyone including the vegetarian thoroughly enjoyed their meal the fried pickles were highly praised by all

in new jersey i frequently encountered people who were rude arrogant and had a cold service attitude when i moved to arizona i found that the people here were not as welcoming as i had hoped i wish they would lighten up and be more friendly im not planning on returning to this location

the food here was very tasty but the service fell short we didnt receive a refill on our drinks as the waitress didnt return to our table we had to ask a manager to fill our drinks for us after the manager did so the waitress came back to check on us

we reserved this hotel based on reviews that turned out to be inaccurate upon arrival we found that the hotel was seedy rundown had rude staff and had female trafficking right at the front door while it may have been suitable for college guys it was not an ideal choice for couples or families

this establishment offers food that is typical of a bar with a dartboard and their own draft called hoot available by pitcher the decor is intriguing featuring movies and sports and the service is friendly and exceptional
would you be interested in hearing about some of the salads at this establishment that are absolutely amazing your favorite is the chopped salad with crawfish
the burgers are not anything special and the fries are not worth the effort

i was at that location for a few days and the service was satisfactory there were no issues encountered and the custodial staff was excellent particularly when we encountered a toilet problem overall i was pleased with my experience
despite being a vegitarian everyone in our large group thoroughly enjoyed the bbq and praised the fried pickles we had to drag them here but it was worth it in the end

could you clarify why this listing indicates that the location is closed despite my recent visit for cocktails on friday during happy hour where i found the prices to be great the place to be cool and the service to be good but it was frustrating that they stated they opened at 4pm but were not fully prepared for customers at that time

las vegas central perk  all they need is an orange couch and gunthernndrinks food music art people and free wifi a nice place to hang out grab a bite and people watchnni like to go there and pretend im phoebe
this place is an absolute joke they served me a beer but then carded me for my players card the bartender had about 5 brain cells

as a new orleans native i have always enjoyed oysters however i was extremely disappointed with the ones i tried recently they were so small that they were the size of my pinky nail which was a major letdown
as someone who hails from new orleans i must admit that i have never felt more disappointed in my life the oysters were unimpressively small measuring only as big as my pinky nail

ive recently dipped my toes into the noodle realm and i must say i was thoroughly impressed by the level of service and quality of the food i had the opportunity to try the green bean tempura and was absolutely amazed by it the ramen bowls were also excellent and the duck bowl was a particularly memorable experience i highly recommend making a visit to this establishment

although starbucks is starbucks this particular location tends to become extremely crowded and often appears to be understaffed the seating options are limited making it difficult to find a quiet spot to sit

i am new to the noodle world but i must say that i was very impressed with the service and the quality of the food i tried the green bean tempura and was completely blown away by its deliciousness the ramen bowls were equally impressive and the duck bowl was a standout i highly recommend this establishment to anyone who is looking for a musttry dining experience i eagerly anticipate my next visit

im not really a big pizza fan but my son is we decided to give this place a try about two months ago i must say im happy i did their pizza tastes so fresh and they have many sauces and fresh ingredients to choose from we have visited here at least once a week since then
the salads here are absolutely ahmazing  my fav is the chopped salad with crawfishdelicious

the show i recently watched was truly remarkable featuring a captivating narrative and a magical set it lasted approximately 120 minutes and left me wanting more i would highly recommend taking the time to watch it

the quality of the knowledge and support offered by home depots employees can be inconsistent with some team members being highly knowledgeable and others lacking expertise at times they assist with projects but at other times they attempt to sell customers a readymade version of their project at a higher price although home depot may not be my favorite store it still offers decent options for home improvement projects

im not a huge fan of pizza but my son is about two months ago we decided to give this restaurant a try and i must say im glad we did the pizza at this place tastes so fresh and they have a variety of sauces and fresh ingredients to choose from weve been visiting this restaurant once a week ever since

i had the pleasure of obtaining a remarkable assortment of pastries from this source to serve at my royal wedding viewing party on friday the intricate and stunning designs of these creations were a sight to behold and a delight to consume not only were they visually impressive but they also tasted absolutely delectable
the quality of taste and service at this spot could be elevated

im not a big fan of pizza but my son is two months ago we decided to try out this restaurant and i have to say im happy i did their pizza tastes so fresh and they have a lot of sauces and fresh ingredients to choose from weve been coming back once a week since then

i stayed at that location for a few days and the service was satisfactory there were no problems during my stay and the custodial staff was great especially when we had a toilet issue overall i was satisfied with my experience

more bar than restaurant the food is what you would expect from a bar they have a dartboard they have their own draft called hoot  available by pitcher interesting decor  movies sports etc excellent friendly service

living in the northeast before moving to arizona i became accustomed to the common rude arrogant and cold service attitude i encountered in new jersey when i arrived in arizona i was disappointed to find that the people here did not exhibit the warm and welcoming demeanor i had hoped for i felt that they should lighten up and be more accommodating i dont plan on returning to this location
